name: Sundarban Tiger Roar Resort
info: Sundarban Tiger Roar Resort is located, on the bank of River Pitchkhali opposite to Sundarban Tiger Reserve, is the Best Resort in Sundarban and is equipped to provide all facilities with a comfortable stay, and breathtaking views of the river and mangrove forest.

name: Prakrity Village Resort Sundarbans
info: Prakrity Village Resort, located at 8 km from the Sundarban National Park, offers accommodation in Sundarban.This 2-storied resort has 13 well-appointed rooms with attached bathrooms. The room amenities include TVs and makeup mirrors.The Sundarban resort provides medical, catering, massage, and wake-up call services to its guests.

name: Paragon Hotel and Resort
info: Paragon Hotel and Resort features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Sreemangal. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy garden views.

name: Sreemangal Inn Hotel & Restaurant
info: Sreemangal Inn Hotel & Restaurant offers accommodation in Sreemangal. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi. There is free private parking and the property features paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Square Park
info: Hotel Square Park offers accommodation in Rāngāmāti. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The hotel has family rooms.

name: Hotel Prince
info: Hotel Prince is offering accommodation in Rāngāmāti. Guests can enjoy city views. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box.

name: Hotel Naz Garden
info: NAZ Garden is the largest and the only international standard 4 star hotel in the northern region of Bangladesh as it occupies an area of about 15 acres land with extraordinary landscape. We are located on the outskirt of Bogra town besides Dhaka-Rangpur highway.

name: Mollika Inn
info: Mollika Inn is a beautiful 3 star restaurant at Naogaon. It's stand beside the main road of Naogaon-Bogra. It's a beautiful place to spend sometimes with friends and family. There many beauty spread here everywhere inside Molliks Inn.

name: Hotel Seven Star (Residential)
info: Featuring 1-star accommodation, Hotel Seven Star is located in Dhaka, 1.8 km from Notre Dame University Bangladesh and 1.7 km from Jagannath University.

name: Hotel White House International Residential
info: Hotel White House International Residential provides accommodation with free WiFi in Dhaka, ideally situated less than 1 km from BUET and a 17-minute walk from University of Dhaka. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and an ATM for guests.

name: FARS Hotel & Resorts
info: “FARS Hotel & Resorts” a Deluxe Boutique Hotel opened 3 years ago with a modern “North End Coffee Shop” in the lobby, spacious rooms with lots of natural light and a highly frequented Japanese restaurant on the rooftop. 51 rooms and suites, gym, Grand Ballroom, 2 restaurants, 24 hour room service and laundry service available.

name: Hotel Purbani Int. Ltd.
info: Featuring free WiFi and a restaurant, Hotel Purbani Int. Ltd. Offers accommodation in Dhaka. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property.

name: Shaiti Homestay cum viewpoint
info: Shaiti Homestay cum viewpoint a Deluxe Boutique Hotel opened 3 years ago with a modern “North End Coffee Shop” in the lobby, spacious rooms with lots of natural light and a highly frequented Japanese restaurant on the rooftop. 51 rooms and suites, gym, Grand Ballroom, 2 restaurants, 24 hour room service and laundry service available.

name: Odyssey Stays Mawlynnong
info: Situated in Mawlynnong in the Meghalaya region, Odyssey Stays Mawlynnong features accommodation with free private parking.Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

name: TreeTop Adventure Farm
info: TreeTop Adventure Farm A hotel which is reasonably priced reasonably clean very value for money… Service is very good food in the restaurants are excellent.

name: Hotel Noorjahan Grand
info: Hotel Noorjahan Grand a Deluxe Boutique Hotel opened 3 years ago with a modern “North End Coffee Shop” in the lobby, spacious rooms with lots of natural light and a highly frequented Japanese restaurant on the rooftop. 51 rooms and suites, gym, Grand Ballroom, 2 restaurants, 24 hour room service and laundry service available.

name: D'more Sajek Valley Hotel & Resort
info: D'more Sajek Valley, Hotel & Resort is a privately owned 3 Star Standard Luxury Hotel in Sajek, Bangladesh. It is a place of choice of most of the tourist, foreigners, newly married couples, and for those who prefer to stay in luxury.

name: Relax Sajek Resort
info: Relax Sajek Resort Hotel Hilltop resort with Sake Valley & Kasalong mountain views, plus modest accommodations & eateries.

name: Hotel Diamond Park
info: Hotel Diamond Park is a privately owned 3 Star Standard Luxury Hotel in Sajek, Bangladesh. It is a place of choice of most of the tourist, foreigners, newly married couples, and for those who prefer to stay in luxury.

name: Red Chillies Restaurant and Guest house
info: Red Chillies Restaurant and Guest house is located in Bogra. There is a restaurant serving Chinese cuisine, and free private parking is available. At the hotel each room is equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a city view.

name: THE ASTERIA HOTEL BOGURA
info: THE ASTERIA HOTEL BOGURA is a 2-star property set in Bogra. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has family rooms. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

name: Hotel Khan Palace
info: Hotel Khan Palace in Kuākāta features 3-star accommodation with a terrace. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. There is a restaurant serving Asian cuisine, and free private parking is available.

name: Hotel Sea Crown Inn
info: Hotel Sea Crown Inn is a 3-star property set in Kuakata. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has family rooms. At the hotel all rooms are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

name: Sonesta Ocean Point Resort
info: Sonesta Ocean Point Resort embraces a contemporary Caribbean style, offering an adults-only, all-inclusive vacation experience, while bringing style, luxury and outstanding service to Sint Maarten.
